DOC.brief_summary: The role of alpha2 receptor agonist on pain perception and modulation will be examined. In addition whether this is mediated through the opioid system will be examined. Pain perception and modulation will be examined before and after administration of Clonidine or placebo together with Naloxone or saline.
DOC.brief_title: The Relationships Between the Noradrenergic, Opioid and Pain System
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Age 1840 No chronic disease Subjects who suffer from chronic pain / pain syndrome use of antidepressant or antipsychotic drugs suffering from cardiovascular disease breast feeding
